author: markt
msg: Restore the validateXml option to Jasper that was previously renamed validateTld. Both options are now supported. validateXml controls the validation of web.xml files when Jasper parses them and validateTld controls the validation of *.tld files when Jasper parses them.

author: joern
msg: OPENNLP-641 Now uses the sequence validator again

author: joern
msg: OPENNLP-641 Added initial sequence classification support
